summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of 9th Avenue South, in the City of Seattle, as a public street and highway over and across certain lots, blocks and parcels of land in said city, and providing for the taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and for the ascertainment and payment of the just compensation to be made for the private property to be taken or damaged for said purpose and for the assessment upon the property beneficial for the purpose of making such compensation.
